SinhalaMeanings:
අරගෙන යනවා,
ගන්නවා,
එක්කගෙන යනවා,
බාරගන්නවා etc.
Usage:
~ something (with someone)
~ something (to someone/something)
~ someone (to something)
~ someone doing something
~ someone to do something
~ someone/something (adv./prep.)
~ something/someone (from someone/something)
~ something (as something)
~ someone/something (as someone/something)

~ (to/with someone) (about something/someone)
~ of someone/something
~ someone into/out of something

~ + adj.
~ of something
~ like something
~ something

~ something (to someone)
~ someone something
~ (someone to do) something
~ someone (that)
~ someone (wh-)

~ something to someone
~ someone something
~ someone that
~ wh-

SinhalaMeanings:
යමක් කරන්නට නැඹුරු වෙනවා,
සාත්තු කරනවා,
රැක බලා ගන්නවා

පරීක්ෂා කර බලනවා,
අත් හදා බලනවා
Usage:
~ something
~ someone (on something)
~ someone/something (for something)
~ something on someone/something

~ someone (with something)
~ (someone ) that
~ to do something

SinhalaMeanings:
විසි කරනවා,
දොට්ට දානවා,
බිම ඇද දමනවා
Usage:
~ (something) (to someone)
~ someone something
~ something (adv./prep.)
~ someone/something + adv./prep.

SinhalaMeanings: දැඩි කායික මානසික වධ හිංසා පමුණුවනවා
එක දෙයකින් තවත් දෙයක් බවට හරවනවා

Usage:
~ someone/something (with something)
~ someone/something (like/as something)
~ someone for something (with something)

SinhalaMeanings:
පය පැටලෙනවා/පැටලී වැටෙනවා,
සැහැල්ලුවෙන් පය තබා ඉක්මනින් යනවා

Usage:
~ someone (to do something)
~ (that)
~ someone with someone/something

SinhalaMeanings:
උත්සාහ කරනවා,
අත්හදා බලනවා,
විනිශ්චය/පරීක්ෂා කරනවා
Usage:
~ to do something
~ something
~ doing something
~ someone/something (for something)
